eventDetails.title: Neo Coding
eventDetails.desc: The Neo coding competition consists of three rounds. The first round is a qualifying round that includes 25 multiple-choice questions and lasts for 30 minutes. The top performers in this round move on to the second round, which is a 1-hour coding contest featuring 25 coding questions. The final round is also a 1-hour coding contest, but this time with three questions of varying difficulty levels (easy, medium, and hard). This competition is designed to test a coder's knowledge and skill across multiple areas of coding and programming, from basics to more advanced topics.

eventDetails.title: Bug Smash
eventDetails.desc: Welcome to the ultimate coding contest! In this competition, you'll face three challenging rounds that will put your coding skills to the test. First up is the Debugging round, where you'll be given a code with errors, and you'll have to find and fix them within a given time frame.Next up is the Blind Coding round, where you'll be given a problem statement, but you won't be able to see your code as you write it. This round will test your ability to visualize and plan your code in advance.Finally, the most exciting round of all - In this round, you'll have to write a complete working code! This round is a true test of your coding efficiency and ability to write clean, concise code.So, whether you're a seasoned programmer or just starting, get ready to put your coding skills to the test and compete with the best in this exciting coding contest!

eventDetails.title: Hash it Out
eventDetails.desc: Hash it Out is a two-round programming event for coding enthusiasts. Round one consists of two coding-related questions to test participants' knowledge and skills. Round two features higher difficulty level questions to challenge participants and showcase their advanced programming abilities. Hash It Out is the perfect opportunity for programmers to showcase their talents, learn new skills, and network with other coding enthusiasts. With exciting challenges and valuable prizes up for grabs, Hash it Out promises to be an engaging and rewarding event for all participants. Register now and join us for a thrilling coding experience!

eventDetails.title: Robo Race
eventDetails.desc: Robo-Race is an exciting event that brings together robotics enthusiasts from around the world to compete in three challenging rounds. In round one, participants compete in a knockout round where their powered vehicles race against each other for a duration of 2 hours. The aim is to complete the track in the shortest time possible. In round two, the timer round, participants must navigate their vehicles through obstacles and challenges, trying to avoid elimination and advance to the final round. The top teams from the first two rounds will then compete in the final round, where they must navigate their vehicles to a specific location in the shortest time possible. The final round is the ultimate test of skill, creativity, and problem-solving ability. Robo-Race is an excellent opportunity to showcase your robotics skills and compete against like-minded enthusiasts. Register now for a thrilling and unforgettable experience!

eventDetails.title: Think Tank
eventDetails.desc: Think Tank is a three-round event for entrepreneurs and startup owners. In round one, participants present their products to a panel of judges. Round two is a group discussion on current market trends and challenges faced by entrepreneurs. Round three involves creating a marketing script and tagline for their product. Winners receive  recognition for their innovative marketing strategies. Think Tank provides an opportunity for networking and gaining valuable insights into the world of business. Register today for an exciting and informative event!

eventDetails.title: Elentra
eventDetails.desc: Elentra is an exciting electrical event that consists of three rounds to challenge and showcase the skills of participants. In round one, participants just correct the given wrong circuits to demonstrate their ability to identify and fix errors in electrical circuits. Round two presents participants with a half-drawn circuit that they must complete to test their knowledge of electrical components and their functions. The final round involves designing a hardware circuit based on given conditions and a final output to showcase participants' creativity and ability to solve complex problems. Elentra promises to be an engaging and rewarding event for all electrical enthusiasts. Register now and showcase your skills!

eventDetails.title: Robo Wrestling
eventDetails.desc: Robo-Wrestling is an exciting event that brings together robotics enthusiasts from all over to compete in three thrilling rounds. In round one, participants showcase their robot building skills as their bots wrestle with each other. The toughest bot moves forward to the next round. In round two, the winners of the first round face off against each other, battling it out to advance to the final round. The final round is the ultimate test, as the top competitors compete for the final time, showcasing their robots' strength and agility. At the end of the event, the top three players are selected based on their performance. Robo-Wrestling is an excellent opportunity to showcase your robotics skills and compete against like-minded enthusiasts. Register now for a thrilling and unforgettable experience!

eventDetails.title: Treasure Mania
eventDetails.desc: Are you ready for an exciting adventure? Join us for a thrilling treasure hunt! Solve clues, riddles and puzzles as you explore the city, seeking hidden treasures and uncovering secrets along the way. Follow the map, hunt for clues, and use your wits to decipher the codes that will lead you to the treasure. With a team of friends or family, it's the perfect way to spend an afternoon or evening outdoors. So get ready to put your problem-solving skills to the test and discover the hidden riches waiting for you on this exciting treasure hunt!

eventDetails.title: Madmax (Fifa) Solo
eventDetails.desc: Get ready for the biggest football tournament! In FIFA, 64 players compete in a series of intense one-on-one matches, with each team battling it out to be crowned champions. With each round lasting between 15-20 minutes, players will need to bring their A-game and demonstrate their skills on the pitch. From dribbling and passing to shooting and defending, it's all about strategy, precision, and teamwork. So grab your controller and get ready to experience the excitement of FIFA like never before!

eventDetails.title: Madmax (Fifa) Duo
eventDetails.desc: Get ready for the biggest football tournament! In FIFA, 64 players compete in a series of intense one-on-one matches, with each team battling it out to be crowned champions. With each round lasting between 15-20 minutes, players will need to bring their A-game and demonstrate their skills on the pitch. From dribbling and passing to shooting and defending, it's all about strategy, precision, and teamwork. So grab your controller and get ready to experience the excitement of FIFA like never before!

eventDetails.title: Madmax (Valorant)
eventDetails.desc: Welcome to the world of Valorant, where 16 teams of 5 members each compete for glory! In this fast-paced and intense game, players use their unique abilities and strategic teamwork to outmaneuver their opponents and dominate the battlefield. With a variety of maps and game modes to choose from, each match is a new challenge that tests your skills and tactical prowess. So gather your team, hone your abilities, and get ready to take on the competition in the ultimate battle for supremacy in Valorant!

eventDetails.title: Mystery Quest (Solo)
eventDetails.desc: Mystery Quest is an exciting quiz game that challenges participants in the electrical and electronics domain. The game comprises of three rounds. In round one, participants are required to answer multiple-choice questions in an online quiz that is accessible through their mobile phones. In round two, participants must solve a crossword puzzle that tests their knowledge of electrical and electronic concepts. The final round is an "escape room" challenge in which participants are locked in a room and must solve clues to escape within a limited time frame. This round tests the participant's ability to apply their knowledge and think creatively. Mystery Quest is an engaging and interactive way to put participants' knowledge and skills to the test.
